segments.text: Hello ! My name is Sandals , I have a reservation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see your identification , please , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Do you have a credit card , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Will American Express do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry , sir . We accept only VISA or MasterCard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Room 507 is a spacious , nonsmoking room , with a queen bed . Does that meet your expectations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that sounds like what I want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's wonderful , sir . Now , here's your key . Should you need anything , just dial 0 .
segments.speaker: S2
